hooks.command: FILE=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path 2>/dev/null'); if [ -z "$FILE" ] || [ "$FILE" = "null" ] || [ ! -f "$FILE" ]; then exit 0; fi; EXTENSION="${FILE##*.}"; case "$EXTENSION" in go) if command -v gofmt >/dev/null 2>&1 && command -v goimports >/dev/null 2>&1; then gofmt -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null && goimports -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null && echo "Formatted Go: $FILE"; else echo "Go formatter unavailable" >&2; fi ;; ts|tsx|js|jsx) if command -v npx >/dev/null 2>&1; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null && echo "Formatted TS/JS: $FILE"; else echo "Prettier unavailable" >&2; fi ;; py) if command -v black >/dev/null 2>&1; then black "$FILE" 2>/dev/null && echo "Formatted Python: $FILE"; else echo "Black unavailable" >&2; fi ;; *) echo "No formatter: $EXTENSION" ;; esac
